title: Why a Democratic House is a Nightmare for Trump
description:
The midterm elections are less than two months away. The chances the Democrats take back the House are high. But what's on the agenda if a Blue Wave washes over the GOP-controlled House? David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg News National Correspondent Sahil Kapur.
FOLLOW UP
Sahil's latest: Trump Scrutiny Would Intensify If Democrats Win House Majority 
You can follow Sahil at @sahilkapur
----
TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
